name: Falling Through Love
description:
LD48 - Theme - Deeper and Deeper

A game about falling deeply in love. But the deeper the two potato-people fall in love, the more difficult the game becomes! The purple bad-looking platforms represent arguments (didn't have the time to properly implement them :frowning2: )! 3 arguments, and you're broken up! That's it! No more tries! Well, unless you press the replay button. 

Like many others, this was my very first Game Jam ever! 

I did the whole thing (except for the last few hours) on stream at https://www.twitch.tv/cinderblockcreates

Feel free to come by and say hello!

While it was pretty tiring, it was certainly a blast! See you guys again in October.
